Jimmy Stewart, the actor, spoke with an (i) _________ that (ii) _________ audiences; through hesitancy and understatement, he was at least as captivating as his flamboyant peers.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
(A) awkward lisp
(D) enthralled
(B) overwhelming passion
(E) repelled
(C)  appealing shyness
(F) amused
